website_summaries.verdict: This well-made stainless steel blackhead removal kit includes everything you need to start getting clear results.
pros: Highly effective way to remove blackheads
Each tool is angled differently and comes in different sizes – no blackhead is safe
Sturdy stainless steel tools are easy to clean and maintain
Kit comes with waterproof carry case and easy-to-follow instructions
cons: Some users report exterior damage on the carry case

website_summaries.verdict: A value-priced option with a long warranty that makes it an even better deal and the most affordable and complete choice on our list.
pros: Not only is this 6-piece kit of stainless steel blackhead removers priced lower than similar competitors, but it also comes with a sturdy compartmentalized case and 18-month warranty
cons: A few reports of missing tools upon arrival, and of the black coating flaking off the instruments over time

customer_reviews.title: The tweezers are the best part
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! I love these tools so much. Especially the tweezers. I've been using them to get filiment hairs off of my husbands back and use them all the time when I get black heads in hard to get at spots. The popper thing is great too for getting at those stubborn pimples that you just can't pop.
customer_reviews.author: PridefulWiccan

customer_reviews.title: a kit with everything
customer_reviews.text: this set is sturdy and well made. The pointed ends all have a plastic cover because they are sharp. The different head pimple poppers do not have any weird raised edges and the metal is pretty strong. I have had one while using the loop break on me and draw blood. this set will NOT do that
customer_reviews.author: ViDMaR

customer_reviews.title: Useful for blackheads even though I would advise anyone purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: As described, timely delivery. Seems to be decent quality tools. Useful for blackheads even though I would advise anyone purchasing to not poke & prod their skin too much if they aren't a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Synne

customer_reviews.title: Loop instrument is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Had a dermatologist remove molluscum that was appearing on my belly. He said that the scoop instrument on a pimple remover kit (the loop on the end of the stick instrument) would easily remove any further ones. He was right! My girlfriend is a popper and had no trouble ripping a few rogue bumps out of me. This gets in and under bumps and grabs the cell body inside. If you don't get those things out, bumps return, infections happen, things get worse, etc. The loop instrument just went right under and brought all of that bad stuff with it. Effective!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Came used?
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Since this review the sellers contacted me immediately and sent me a new set without charge. The tools are solidly made, and easy to clean a great purchase. They seem nice and solidly made but mine have skin flakes and a black head on them. I'm not returning them because I need them now and will through clean them but it was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BBow

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting legos out of small ears!
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this is the tweezers. I think the first thing I "tweezed" was a small lego piece out of my 4yr old's ear. Thank goodness it worked. It's a lot cheaper than an ER visit! I've used the other pieces some but I'm still learning how to use the different tools. They seem like quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: SARA DEES

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetician's tools
customer_reviews.text: I handled these tools and felt like a surgeon. I will only use a few of them, but they are precision instruments that look fit for a doctor's office. The blackhead remover alone is worth the full price of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: oh my!
customer_reviews.text: If you pick your face a lot (like I do) these could be your best friend or worst enemy. They are sharp, precise and addicting. I was picking at everything. I don't have pimples, I would dig my blackheads and made a mess of my face! If you don't have self-control these should be a hard pass. If you can control yourself and not pick at every bump on your face, then these are perfect. They even come with a nice case too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: These don't work. You'll rip your skin before getting an extraction. I have another set that work 10x better with light pressure so I will repurchase those.
customer_reviews.author: shedaisy

customer_reviews.title: The tools work perfectly fine and the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: The tools work perfectly fine and the quality is great, but I ordered the black tools and the paint chips off when I sterilize and wash them. This doesn't effect the performance, but esthetically they look bad to me. I am very particular with all of my tools and the look of my treatment room, so this minor detail bugs me. I would suggest to just always get your esthetics tools in the natural metal with no paint to avoid this dilemma.
customer_reviews.author: klynn954

customer_reviews.title: I want to say something I shouldn't....
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend unless you're trying to use this on kids or you're a teen who hasn't fully grown yet. Seriously, this product is flea market quality. Wouldn't recommend. Tiny, cheaply made, and 80% useless. Can it work for some? Sure. Didn't work for me nor my wife. We are no longer buying chinese garbage products and recommend you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Ravenix

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved the appearance of this product. However, when i tried to use them, it felt very uncomfortable. The plastic type section of the product kept poking my skin when i would try to us it. It made it painful to use. I've only used it twice and now it's just sitting in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LuvT

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The products are nice and what I expected. Cheap set but feel like nice quality. 4 stars because the metal box came smashed on one side somehow. My cardboard box was perfectly fine so it must have been shipped damaged already? It won't close after I opened it which is a little frustrating because I would have liked to keep it in the container. That is my only complaint about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: For younger faces.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure these would be great on young skin but for my 50 year old face, the tools are just too thick to work well. I do like the tweezers though. If you have a teen or have blackheads, this would probably work much better. That being said, I’ll most likely give them to my 15 year old grandson. The set has several different size tools That all do the same thing but it could easily be broken up for stocking stuffers. As for the tweezers, worth the price of the set to use them with my Cricut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap starter set
customer_reviews.text: What I like: - case - foam for the parts - guide on how to use the tools - comes with unique tweezers (note they are sharp) - feels sturdy What I don’t like - some tools have a textured grip and others don’t. I think all the tools should have grips except the tweezers, so the tools don’t slip. These don’t seem particularly easy or hard to clean. I’ll be soaking them in alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Author Sable Sylvan (Heather Davies)

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing but mar my face.
customer_reviews.text: Jump out of the shower, can squeeze with my fingers plenty of junk, but I use these and they just leave marks on my face — Nothing comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Empty

customer_reviews.title: They work well.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing torture device. My wife loves to dig at my back. I regret buying this. It works really well though.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this set is the tweezers. The rest are utterly useless. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley 43130

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge fan of milia extractors, still this is a very decent set. They’re sturdy and easy to sanitize, with a nice variety of extractors in the set. A coworker bought this set first and I liked it so much I bought one too. I prefer qtips for extractions, but once in a while a milia extractor is needed.
customer_reviews.author: m.rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: As an esthetician, I’m always trying new tools. These look sleek, are not too long and really get the job done. Especially love the tweezer-like extractor. You poke the blackhead with the tip, then flip it over to squeeze the pore and purge the plug. Essentially, your pinching below the opening of the blackhead so the comedone can easily be squeezed out. If you’re not squeamish, it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Biesele

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a year ago. Some are sturdy and others bend easy. Compared to other products ive used its just average and doesn't work as well as some. But its a good price for a large set of options and comes in a nice quality case thats easy to keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Bye blackheads!
customer_reviews.text: There are hardheaded blackheads who kept coming back and needed to be pricked, which my electric pore vacuum cannot do-this is where these metal tools come in. Its just that.... shipping fee and tax were almost the same as the price of my purchased item. But I need it and must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Ailyn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The pack only had 4 tools in it and not 6
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I use these constantly to get at black heads and pimples and they’re super easy to clean and use. I don’t even damage my skin using these which is normally really easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Works but is not a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: Best blackhead remover set works well, but most of the tools are just redundant. They are easy to clean and feel good in the hand, but it would be nice if the case had a hinge. Most of the tools are useless. the one I found Most effective is the one with a small hoop. Or a square hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Don Power

customer_reviews.title: For my pimple popping lovers
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of pimple popping. It brings me so much joy being able to have my own kit to get those nasty little black heads on my cheeks without having to use my fingers. There’s literally a tool for everything. Always clean your tools before and after use.
customer_reviews.author: Dia Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The variaty is good, but the tweezer don't make good contact and it's very difficult to use them. The customer service is very helpful and will solve any issue with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Artbeans

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers were bent.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but my tweezers came bent and won’t work right. :(
customer_reviews.author: BrookeC

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice variety of tools. In reality, one or two is all you need, so this just allow us (myself and daughters) to each have our own. I would normally expect to pay this much for just one remover. The nice case is a really nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Functional, practical, price point
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for without spending a big chunk of money. Came in a very nice storage case that is lined and each tool has it's own little cut out so you know where each one should go. Nice quality, sturdy, and will not bend with repeat use. I have recommended to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: Denise-Florida

customer_reviews.title: Very precise, accurate and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: This tools are very comfortable to use. It’s very precise and accurate to work with. It has a very good grip, you can easily rotate the needle. You definitely need a make up mirror. I’m a man, but I had to purchase me one. There’s no chance without a magnifying mirror, good looking geht and actually its too dangerous if it’s too close to the eyes. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Magran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variation
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Tools are great quality, very well made. I struggle with the thin extractors trying to find ones that don't bend and these fit the bill. The only issue I had was the head of the tweezers. They don't line up well causing inconsistency when trying to grab. It's not useless, but not perfect. Still great set of tools and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, or buy a higher quality product. Cheap cr@p
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Never knew I needed this
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this kit. The quality is professional grade, and who knew there were so many tools (with a helpful explanation sheet included) for removing blackheads? An impressive purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Flanamom

customer_reviews.title: Blackhead remover set
customer_reviews.text: No matter what your age (I am over 70) you can still get blackheads. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine and dandy
customer_reviews.text: Don't need to press hard, poker is way too big is my only complaint. It's larger than pore size, by allot, and it's not sharp. But overall, great lil kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very strong. Easy to pop larger pimples, a bit difficult for the smaller ones. Instructions for each tool could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great storage case, good value for the money! Tools feel very durable and are easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: BOX

customer_reviews.title: My wife found her calling and the tools to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. My wife seems to have a closet OCD issue. She simply MUST pop blackheads. Too bad she doesn't get paid. She is in heaven with these. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Hipnoodle

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if that's a good or bad thing
customer_reviews.text: This brings picking to a whole new level. I'm not sure if that's a good or bad thing, but I like the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferK.

customer_reviews.title: Seems high quality
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good, shipping was fast. Seller is interested in making sure you read instructions and know how to use items so you don't harm yourself. The tools seem very sturdy and high quality. The pointed curved tweezers are worth the price of this set alone. I am sure this set will get plenty of use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy G

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are neat but only 1 that really works, is the hooked tweezer. Non of the others really get anything out. Edit: Company did reimburse since they didn’t really work, even though I didn’t request it. Good company.
customer_reviews.author: Lively

customer_reviews.title: Leaves scabs after use
customer_reviews.text: It seems to make the area turn to a scab you have to press really hard and scrap downward
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer yates

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This tool works very well if your pores are more open. You can prepare your skin by cleaning it with very warm water before using the tool. The suction is very strong so be careful not to leave it on one spot very long.
customer_reviews.author: Valeri Hemming

customer_reviews.title: Dont know if it worth the money sorry.
customer_reviews.text: These were a little tight to use, I even took them out to let them loosen up and tht seemed not to loosen.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality of the product but they are very nice. I especially like using the curved hook with point. I really like using these grooming tools, much better than the single loop you buy at a Walgreens or something.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price of one at the store
customer_reviews.text: Well made & for the price you really cant beat it. So if your looking for something like this Look no further. Its really a no brainer cheap and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Really work's well.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well made, not cheap junk like most of the ones that I have seen available.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin MacDowell

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good product. A challenge to figure out what tool works best for what. Instructions are vague. Otherwise, no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! Came with a pocket guide book on which tool to use in which situation. The box holds them all nicely. It was so worth it, I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: This has every Blackhead tool you need.
customer_reviews.text: Love the little tool set. It’s cute, made of metal so it is easy to disinfect and comes with a nice case. The only problem is that my case was damaged. It still closes but is a little difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. All of the tools are well designed and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Ryland

customer_reviews.title: The tweezers were great, but got bend out of shape within a ...
customer_reviews.text: Only use one piece out of this set. The tweezers were great, but got bend out of shape within a month to the point where I couldn't use them, so that's too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: Pimples be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I love pimple poppin' the right way. This set makes it so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Da1KutieK04

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I literally pick my face all the time with these tools. Which, admittedly isn't great for my face, but the pimples be popping. But seriously, this set is a good quality and I've had it about two years now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rutger

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an unconventional gift idea when my daughter suggested it, but the grandkids absolutely loved it. They were "operating" on people before they got the wrapping paper off.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: Not for blackheads
customer_reviews.text: The metal loops on all the tools are far to large to be effective on blackheads. The set I received had some rust on them. They work on whiteheads and pimples but not blackheads
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The pinching tool is the best for plucking eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: All the tools work well, be careful using on face, it can scar if not careful. The pinching tool is the best for plucking eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: So great being able to use tools made for the job ...
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how much I'd use this. As soon as I see a zit starting to form, I break this out and hit it early. So great being able to use tools made for the job instead of improvising, or using fingers to pinch. Love my zit-kit.
customer_reviews.author: LostinBoston

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to use lol I use them on my husbands back he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Never felt so satisfied and excited popping my pimples
customer_reviews.text: Never felt so satisfied and excited popping my pimples. Needed some practices with different tools but, for the most part, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily they are to use. And work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Joelda

customer_reviews.title: ElleSye 6-Pcs
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for a teenager so I can not give you a personal review. So far though, her comments have been appreciative and enthusiastic about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Just grabbed one of these tools and reached acrross my shoulder to the ingrown hair turned pimple on my back and this came right out in the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Truckeeflyguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product... cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality acne tools! I'm really surprised that I got a great product for such a cheap price. The tools come in a metal container with foam that holds them all in place. They are super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nursey, Wifey, Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my young adult son. He really likes them so that is all that matters to me. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy for what they are. Nice touch/feel, and finished nicely. For the price it was a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss
customer_reviews.text: Yesssss I love popping pimples this is so satisfying lmao
customer_reviews.author: Carolina g bellini

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, just a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set but the tools are a little flimsy. I feel like they could break easily.
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it appears
customer_reviews.text: The pimple popper show makes this look so easy! It’s not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Its worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use these SO much. I love that I have every tool I need to get rid of imperfections in my skin. The cost is perfect, and I would buy if you are looking for a set to get.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana rivers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Tools are sturdy, easy to use and a good quality. All 6 pieces work great and they come in a small case which holds everything well in place and doesn't take up too much space. Would definitely buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Anette Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I really only use one of these to extract the sebum from my nose. If I find a use for the others then it’s a plus. Great kit! No rust or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality would have been better. Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a tin container with a little manual that explains each little extractor. They are easy to use and clean. I would recommend this to anyone who wants some extractors and is priced well too.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: MUST GET!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!! The quality is amazing! All I do to clean it get dish soapworts hot hot water and soak them for like 3 minutes. Then in the rubbing alcohol they go for 10 mins and boom you got yourself a nice clean disinfected tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Nice, quality product. I accidentally dropped the pointed tool and it bent the end but the seller sent a brand new replacement kit ASAP. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and shipped quickly. Have not used it yet but opened the package to examine the tools. They were very nice and after inspecting them they looked like very good quality. Very nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P Dahmer

customer_reviews.title: Good clean product and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to deal with pimples a lot with my hands and that takes forever and sucks might I add.. in fact, this made it easier for me, I’m still getting use to using it but it is now my go-to for zit/pimple popping. And the puncture needle was actually sharp so another win
customer_reviews.author: Technolilly

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good tools! Have used them a couple of times since received. Having different ones to choose from has been awesome! So much better than picking squeezing with fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fiancé that’s addicted to Dr. Pimple Popper as a gag and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: John Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging and the product itself. However, there were some that have rust on the tip and were not able to get cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a good weight in my hand. It comes with a handy paper that explains what each tool is for. My case was bent on one of the corners when I received it, but it didn’t affect anything inside so I’m just dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: DLively

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be nice quality. It helped save me $50 at the doctors office to get out an ingrown beard hair.
customer_reviews.author: mec888

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality product. Comes in a nice container and i like the foam fit insert.
customer_reviews.author: MR.BEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy them after watching hours of Dr Pimple Popper on Youtube. LOL. They do the job!!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient to use, but be careful not to cut your skin while using it!
customer_reviews.author: bs0602

customer_reviews.title: Strong metal, durable, and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Strong tools. Doesn’t bend at all under pressure. Nice and heavy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A

customer_reviews.title: They do what there supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Not bad they work well only issue is the black is already chipping off only had these 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Kim KD

customer_reviews.title: Good for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Be your own dr.pimple popper with this set ! Everything you need to do so
customer_reviews.author: big evil

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality beauty tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice storage tin. Quality tools. A wide variety of tools for pimples and blackheads etc. so you can avoid damaging your skin. My teens and I both need a set!

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: case has no latch and lid falls off so easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these, seriously a big help keeping my pores clean and getting those stubborn black heads out of my nose

customer_reviews.title: Price is happily affordable. Looks different
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Price is happily affordable. Looks different, and the set is great.

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one package
customer_reviews.text: Great selection. Different sizes for different uses. My wife is very happy with the complete package.

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Solid material. Easy to clean. I use every week as part of my weekly regiment.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Works well if you want to do your own extractions. I use it regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need for cute little case. Everything in the case looks like professional tools.

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakouts
customer_reviews.text: These tools are great! If you have breakouts you should have this. The tools are delicate, which is needed for small things like pores and spots.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This grooming kit is amazing! Would definitely recommend for anyone whom enjoys extracting blackheads!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Ellesye Blackhead Remover,6 PCS Pimple Popper Tool with a Metal Storage Box,Stainless Steel Pimple Extractor Blackhead Removal Tool Risk Free Treatment for Blemish,Whitehead Popping,Blemish Acne Zit
product_meta.description:
Ellesye Professional Blackhead Comedone Extractor Tool Kit

★★★ 5 Easy & Safe Steps 
Follow the instructions carefully and always remember to be gentle

Step 1: Clean your face with cleansing products. Remember to be gentle with the area of acne

Step 2: Use a warm towel on your face for a few minutes to open your pores first, to get a better effect

Step 3: Take out the acne needle from the packing box, clean the needle

Step 4: Using the needle to pierce the maturing acne gently. Take acne’s opening as the center, put on the press ring and then press down the ring slowly

Step 5: Using distilled or anti-inflammatory water to clean the area of acne after squeezing it


★★★ Tips:

1. Use the extractor after the acne is matured; when acne is inflamed, feels stubborn or a little pain, please not use any extractor, as it would make the situation worse

2. Disinfect the acne needle with alcohol before and after each use

3. If the tool not been disinfected before use, or facial be contaminated by the skin bacteria, it may cause scars; tea tree or lavender essential oil will help with the marks and inflammatory subsided
feature_bullets: 【EFFECTIVE BLACKHEAD REMOVER TOOL】: 6-piece of blackhead removal tools in different sizes and angles for extract blackheads/whiteheads and remove different sizes of pimples, zits, acnes, fat grains on your chin, cheek, forehead and nose
【CLEAN & STAINLESS STEEL】: Made of high quality stainless steel keep clean. All comedone extractor are polished, which means they will not hurt your skin, no need to worry about scarring anymore

【POWERFUL TWEEZERS】: The blackhead tweezers with sharped tips, not only can be used as a tweezers, but also a whiteheads scraper. The curved tip is specifically engineered to prevent injury and skin reaction.

【USING IT WITHOUT PAIN】: This blackhead remover tool won't cause any damage and scarring. Scientific tips even hold things firmly and won't irritate your skin or bring any hurt. We don't suggest use any zit popper tool before the acne matured.
【EASY CARRYING STORAGE BOX】: Comes with a storage box for keeping your tool in prefer order and easy carrying your blackhead remover tools with you when travelling.
